_header: Your light grievance shall not me constrain
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; carols, amorous
_description: A song to his uncertain mistress — four monorhyming quatrains (same rhyme throughout) with refrain and burden: ‘How shold Y plece a creature uncerteyne’

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Your light greuans shall not me constrayneTo avoyde your
                    custumabyll disdayne…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
Speke or ye smyte barke or ye byte holde yowre hondes twayneHow
                    shold Y plece a creature oncerteyne
